Title: Alien³
Writer: Dan O'Bannon (characters), Ronald Shusett (characters), Vincent Ward (story), David Giler (screenplay), Walter Hill (screenplay), Larry Ferguson (screenplay)
Actors: Sigourney Weaver, Charles S. Dutton, Charles Dance, Paul McGann
Plot: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she has brought along an unwelcome visitor.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 22 nominations.
